author: felicity
msg: Cleaned up the documentation about --username a little to make it
(hopefully) very obvious that setting "--username" disables the setuid()
functionality in the code, even if the specified username is "root".

author: quinlan
msg: use a hash for month mappings to avoid repeating work

author: quinlan
msg: test some faster revisions for six slow rules
bug 821: test for "good" RFC2369 headers (final attempt at this idea, we hope)

author: felicity
msg: fix for bug 1593 apparently sometimes MakeMaker and RPM have a
disagreement about where they think the man pages should be, and our
previous kluge for INSTALLMAN1DIR wasn't actually doing anything since
"make install" uses INSTALLSITEMAN1DIR.  So this patch forces all 3
different man paths to be the same as RPM is expecting.
